parameters.name: BackupObjectType
parameters.description: The object type of the backup sets to be queried.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number, which takes effect in a pagination query.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of rows to return on each page.
- Maximum value: 100.
- Default value: 10.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The backup start time, in the format of *yyyy-MM-dd* T *HH:mm:ss* Z (UTC time).

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the backup sets to be queried.
